description: Determines the damage done by physical moves used by the Pokemon.
Determines the damage inflicted by physical moves used against this Pokemon.
Determines the damage inflicted by special moves used against this Pokemon. In Generation 1, Special Attack and Special Defense are combined into a single stat, 'Special'.
Determines the damage inflicted by special moves used against this Pokemon.
Determines the order in which Pokemon act in battle. For Pokemon moving in the same priority bracket, the Pokemon with the higher Speed goes first, with ties broken randomly.
The rate at which the Pokemon lands its moves.
The rate at which the Pokemon avoids attacks.
The rate at which the Pokemon scores critical hits.
The rate at which the secondary effects of the Pokemon's moves occur.
